guide.title: Web Space configuration for dev.gentoo.org
guide.abstract: This guide documents how a Gentoo developer can configure their personal webspace on our dev cluster.

body.title: Getting your personal dev environment web ready
body.p: After logging into emu (dev.gentoo.org), you are presented with your home directory.
body.pre: username@emu username$ username@emu username$ mkdir public_html username@emu username$ chmod -R 755 public_html username@emu username$ chmod -R o+x ~username
body.p: After this, you have free to scp files up to dev.gentoo.org as so
